properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 15 at 9:32AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

Green River at Paradise and Calhoun

.The Green River at Paradise Kentucky is cresting and will start a
slow fall the latter part of the weekend. It is forecast to fall into
minor flood on Monday evening and then go below flood stage on Wednesday.
Calhoun will crest at 26.5 feet on Sunday afternoon before starting a
slow fall.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Green River at Calhoun
* until further notice.
* At  9:00 AM Saturday the stage was 26.1 feet.
* Flood Stage is 23.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 26.5 feet by
Sunday afternoon.  Additional rises may be possible thereafter.
* Impact...At 26.0 Feet...Moderate flooding occurs with thousands of
acreage flooded in the Island, Rumsey, and Jewel City areas.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
